com.cyc.base

Class CycApiException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.cyc.base.BaseClientRuntimeException
            • com.cyc.base.CycApiException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CycApiClosedConnectionException, CycApiServerSideException, CycCommandTool.ConverseException

    public class CycApiException
extends BaseClientRuntimeException
    Class CycApiException indicates an error condition during a Cyc API call. This type of exception is thrown when errors on the Java side are caught, when errors on the Cyc server side are caught a CycApiServerSideException is thrown instead.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
